Event.Message: The Offline Files service started successfully.
The Offline Files service is terminating.
The Offline Files service is waiting for all running tasks to complete.
The Offline Files service has terminated.
The Offline Files service received a STOP or SHUTDOWN control from the Service Control Manager. The service will now stop.
The Offline Files driver (csc.sys) is not running.
User logon detected Account: %1 Session: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Account" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Session" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: User logoff detected Account: %1 Session: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Account" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Session" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Path disconnected. %1
Path reconnected. %1
Background agent failed startup, error = %1

Background Synchronization failed on
%1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Result" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Background Synchronization executed successfully.

Background Synchronization has started on
%1
as client has not synced for %2 minutes.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="MinutesSinceLastSync" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Path %1 transitioned to slow link with latency = %2 and bandwidth = %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Latency" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Bandwidth" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Path %1 transitioned to online with latency = %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Latency" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sync info for %1 Only the server copy exists. %10 See details for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ServerIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientDeleted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerLastWriteTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerChangeTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ServerSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SyncState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SyncStateText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sync info for %1 Only the client copy exists. %12 See details for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientIsSparse" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientCreatedOffline" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientDeletedOffline" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientLastWriteTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ClientChangeTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ClientAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ClientSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ServerDeleted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="SyncState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SyncStateText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sync info for %1 Both client and server copies exist. %17 See details for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientIsSparse" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientCreatedOffline" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientLastWriteTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ClientChangeTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ClientAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ClientSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ServerIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerLastWriteTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerChangeTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ServerSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SyncState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SyncStateText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sync info for %1 Server copy exists, client copy deleted. %13 See details for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientIsSparse" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ClientCreatedOffline" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerLastWriteTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerChangeTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ServerSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SyncState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SyncStateText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sync info for %1 Server copy exists, client copy replaced then deleted. %10\ See details for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerIsDir" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerChanged" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="ServerLastWriteTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerChangeTime" inType="win:FILETIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="ServerAttributes" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ServerSize" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SyncState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SyncStateText" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Sync succeeded.
%1
Operation: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Operation" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message:
Sync failed.
%1
Operation: %2 Result: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Path" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Operation" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Result" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Creation of new excluded file type %1 was blocked.
Rename of file %1 to file %2 was blocked. The source and/or target file name is an excluded file type.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourcePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TargetPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
